label: 管領
本: From Sovereign to Symbol: An Age of Ritual Determinism in Fourteenth Century Japan . Oxford University Press . 2012
説明文: The post of deputy shogun" created by Ashikaga Yoshiakira for Hosokawa Yoriyuki, who acted as a regent for the third shogun Yoshimitsu, from 1367 until 1379. Upon coming of age, Yoshimitsu deposed Yoriyuki and thereafter appointment to this powerful position was alternated among individuals of the Hatakeyama, Hosokawa, and Shiba families."
